UpdateLog.description:
[title]Notes[/title][font]Tiny[/font] Updated for 1.3 [title]Bug Fixes[/title] Fixed all bugs pertaining to 1.3 update
[title]New Additions[/title] [b]Vehicle specific pathing[/b] Vehicles used to check path costs in the middle of finding a path, with reachability determined through 2 multithreaded paths running in opposite directions searching for fail conditions.
It sounds messy... and that's cause it was. With the new changes each vehicle will generate their own set of regions as well as their own path grid. This streamlines pathing for vehicles and will open up the door to better pathing customization like amphibious vehicles.
[title]Additional Changes[/title]
[title]Final Notes[/title][font]Tiny[/font] Please report any issues you find [link]https://github.com/SmashPhil/Vehicles/issues[/link](here.)
